all.name: Classic Lemonade

all.description: Creamy risotto infused with black truffles, Parmigiano-Reggiano, and a drizzle of truffle oil.

all.description: Thin slices of Wagyu beef, arugula, shaved Parmesan, and a lemon vinaigrette.

all.name: Foie Gras Torchon
all.description: Rich foie gras served with toasted brioche and a fig compote.

all.name: Grilled Filet Mignon
all.description: Tender filet mignon steak cooked to perfection, served with garlic mashed potatoes and sautéed asparagus.

all.name: Lobster Bisque
all.description: Velvety lobster bisque with a touch of cognac and crème fraîche.

beverages.name: Classic Lemonade
beverages.description: Freshly squeezed lemons with a hint of sweetness.

beverages.description: A world-renowned Sauternes with notes of honey and apricot.

beverages.name: Perrier-Jouët Champagne
beverages.description: A luxurious Champagne with a floral bouquet and delicate bubbles.

cocktails.name: Negroni Sbagliato
cocktails.description: A twist on the classic Negroni with Prosecco, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

cocktails.description: Gin, lemon juice, and Champagne in a refreshing, bubbly cocktail.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters, garnished with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur shaken to perfection.

lunch.name: Crab Salad with Avocado
lunch.description: Fresh lump crab meat served with avocado, citrus segments, and a champagne vinaigrette.

lunch.name: Lobster Roll
lunch.description: Chunks of Maine lobster served in a toasted brioche bun with herb mayo.

lunch.name: Burrata Salad
lunch.description: Creamy burrata with heirloom tomatoes, fresh basil, and a balsamic reduction.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast, crisp romaine, Caesar dressing, and Parmesan shavings.

dinner.description: Seared scallops on a bed of cauliflower purée with a citrus beurre blanc.

dinner.description: Tender lamb rack served with roasted vegetables and rosemary jus.

dinner.name: Black Truffle Gnocchi
dinner.description: Soft potato gnocchi tossed in a black truffle cream sauce.

dinner.name: Sea Bass en Papillote
dinner.description: Delicate sea bass baked in parchment with lemon, herbs, and vegetables.
